title: Dalhousie research team prepares for clinical trial of COVID-19 vaccine
description: A virologist at Dalhousie University who's at the forefront of Canada’s quest to find a treatment for COVID-19 says human trials for a promising new vaccine could be only weeks away.
content: A Dalhousie University researcher at the forefront of Canada s quest to find a treatment for COVID says human trials for a promising new vaccine could be only weeks away Dalhousie s COVID rapid response team is moving forward with testing a vaccine th chars
